description: A detailed blog review and analysis of Episode 468, praising the Smoker fight animation and Hancock's rescue intervention. The review credits Oda for keeping the war arc fresh with unexpected moments.

title: LUFFY VS MARINEFORD! One Piece REACTION Episode 467, 468
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction video covering episodes 467 and 468 of One Piece, showing reactors' responses to Luffy's battles at Marineford.

title: One Piece Collection 19 (Episodes 446-468)

description: Review of the DVD/Blu-ray collection covering episodes 446-468, which includes the early Marineford Arc episodes.

title: 468-469: "Hard Battles, One After Another! Devil Fruit Eaters Vs. Devil Fruit Eaters" and "Kuma's Transformation! Ivan-san's Blow of Anger"

description: A blog post reviewing episodes 468-469, discussing the battles between Devil Fruit users and the emotional revelation about Kuma's transformation.

description: Full reaction video for episodes 468 and 469, available to Patreon supporters.
